pli-tv-bu-vb-pc15:1.5: For the meaning of _senāsana_, see the Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc15:2.1.8: Sp-yoj 1.112: _Cammakhaṇḍoti ettha cammaṁyeva ante khaṇḍattā chinnattā cammakhaṇḍoti vuccati_, “Here _cammakhaṇḍa_ is just a hide. Because it is cut up within and made of pieces, it called a _cammakhaṇḍa_.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc15:2.3.5: Sp 2.118: _Kenaci palibuddhaṁ hotīti vuḍḍhatarabhikkhūissariyayakkhasīhavāḷamigakaṇhasappādīsu yena kenaci senāsanaṁ palibuddhaṁ hoti_, “_Kenaci palibuddhaṁ hoti_: by whatever the furniture is obstructed, such as the authority of more senior monks, a spirit, a lion, a wild beast, or a black snake.”
